thread.title: 63-Year-Old Christie Brinkley Poses For Sports Illustrated « CBS Philly
thread.title_full: 63-Year-Old Christie Brinkley Poses For Sports Illustrated « CBS Philly

title: 63-Year-Old Christie Brinkley Poses For Sports Illustrated « CBS Philly
text:
63-Year-Old Christie Brinkley Poses For Sports Illustrated February 7, 2017 9:15 AM NEW YORK, NY - JUNE 24: (L-R) Alexa Ray Joel poses for photos with her mother Christie Brinkley after performing at Cafe Carlyle on June 24, 2014 in New York City. (Photo by Astrid Stawiarz/Getty Images) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Christie Brinkley is back in a bikini on a Sports Illustrated cover, with her daughters! A photo posted by Christie Brinkley (@christiebrinkley) on Feb 6, 2017 at 6:22pm PST 
Brinkley, 63, was featured on the first Sports Illustrated cover in 1979 and has returned to the SI swimsuit team 38 years later. 
Brinkley’s daughters Alexa Ray Joel, 31, and Sailor Brinkley Cook, 18, join her in the magazine which will be released on February 15th. Christie Brinkley, 63, is back in her swimsuit for @SI_Swimsuit —with her daughters! https://t.co/p6bkQRNLqz pic.twitter.com/eQEFs8WT4y 
Related: Joel Embiid Seems To Be Crushing On Canadian Model Danielle Knudson 
“This is a real full circle moment for me and I can get very emotional about this, I really can,” Brinkley told People Magazine in the video above. “How many years ago, I was that insecure girl and hoping that I would be good enough for the magazine.”
